attack_msg:
Although [you] didn't push far, there is already a strong gush of blood...
[You] deal[y] [damage] damage.

[You] thrust[y] forward, hoping to pierce directly through [their] head. [You're] unsuccessful, but [you] still get a small hit in.
[You] deal[y] [damage] damage.

Laughing lightly, [you] stay[y] light on [your] toes, predicting [their] movements... and strike[y]!
[You] deal[y] [damage] damage.
